text: Halli Jisu'n inmani diang aleimasang, â€œMitkacho khan muna innei, kasitheimak in insithei, takbangri karoonngai amindam,7:22. amindam: 5:12. kuorkaseet in injet, kathi kha aminring, halli chongkahoi kha sara ngaidiang arilpi tia nangni'n ningmuli ning ijet ngaihi si inlang John diang juotipiru. Isa 35:5,6; Isa 61:1
